sentences.english: Therefore, the Lama Temple main hall to the original green glazed tile yellow glazed tile.
sentences.chinese: 因此，雍和宮主要殿堂原綠色琉璃瓦改爲黃色琉璃瓦。

sentences.english: Now Yonghegong is a temple belonging to the Yellow Hats, and it is very prosperous.
sentences.chinese: 現在的雍和宮屬於黃教的寺廟，香火很旺。

sentences.english: I want to take you all to visit the Lama Temple.
sentences.chinese: 我要帶大家去參觀雍和宮。

sentences.english: Take the No. 909 bus just besides our hotel about 30 minutes to get.
sentences.chinese: 賓館附近雍和宮橋東坐909路公車大山子下車。

sentences.english: It can be said that the Lama Temple is the "specifications" the highest a Buddhist temple.
sentences.chinese: 可以說，雍和宮是全國“規格”最高的一座佛教寺院。

sentences.english: If you are not too busy, we could go to the Lama Temple.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不太忙，咱們可以去雍和宮。
